short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically converts cryptocurrencies to your local currency based on location

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
USDT Local Currency Converter is a lightweight and efficient Chrome extension that helps you quickly convert USDT (Tether) to your local currency. Perfect for crypto traders and enthusiasts who need quick conversions.

• Uses real-time cryptocurrency data from CoinGecko
• Automatic currency updates every minute
• Supports all major world currencies
• No registration or setup required

• No personal data collection
• Location detection only for currency selection
• No analytics or tracking
